1: Ikigono ikya wudatu, kwali nu lukeelanilo lwa noolane ku wudzenge wa Kana, mu mugoola gwa Galilaya. Ku noolane iyo, aali kwali ungʼina va Yesu.
2: UYesu na vanyigendwa vaakwe, navo vaalaaliikwe ku noolane iyo.
3: Umusika avagendzi pe vaamalile idifwayi yonda, ungʼina va Yesu akumulongelaga iitigilaga, “Muswamu-vanguave, avagendzi vámalile idifwayi.”
4: UYesu akumuhigaga iitigilaga, “Yuuva, kye kiki ukuundongela ewo? Umusika gwangu gusinaa gufika.”
5: Ungʼina akuvalongelaga avalimila-vangi iitigilaga, “Luluvedzaga lwe ahadza akuvalongela umuswamu-vangu, mulimage.”
6: Apoono apo, dzaali poodzili indziilo mutanda (6), idzaawuyiipwe na maganga. AVayahudi vaasopaga umo ululenga lwa kulimila imivedzehedze gyawo gya kukalava, ukuta viivaladze. Indziilo yimwinga yaamemaga mateneka gahaanu enewuli mutanda.
7: UYesu akuvalongelaga avalimila-vangi avo iitigilaga, “Mumemye ululenga mu ndziilo idzi.” Navo viimemyaga ululenga mu ndziilo idzo ukufikila pa mulomo.
8: Neke uYesu avalongelage atigilage, “Lino munege, mumupeele umukomi va lukeelanilo.” Navo viilimaga ewo.
9: Umukomi uyo aagedziidze ululenga ulo, lwe aahambwise uYesu ukuvedza difwayi. Umukomi uyo asaadzeeliye kwe yíhumile, neke kangi avalimila-vangi avaanegeeliye ululenga, vaadzeeliye kwe yíhumile. Neke amukemeelage umutoodzi.
10: Akumulongelaga iitigilaga, “Avaanu vonda vaavitala tandi ukutawula idifwayi inofu, neke kangi umusika avagendzi pe vágaalile, apo viileeta idifwayi indzulufu. Neke kangi uveeve úyilekile idifwayi inofu iyi ukufikila lino!”
11: UYesu aahuufiidze ikimanyilo iki ku wudzenge wa Kana ya mu Galilaya. Wugendela wa kimanyilo ikyo, ikyali kya kutala, aawoneesiidze indolo dzaakwe, avanyigendwa vaakwe navo vakumufuuwaga.
12: Ulukeelanilo lwa noolane pe lwaviye lúsilile, uYesu pamwinga nu ngʼina, avanungʼuve, na vanyigendwa vaakwe, viihelelaga ku wudzenge wa Kapelenahumu, vakwikalaga uko figono fikeefu.
13: Umusika ikyaka kya Paasaka ya Vayahudi pe kyali biihi, uYesu iihelelaga ku Yelusalemu.
14: Neke iingilage mu lipaala lya tembeli, avawonage umo avaagudzaga isenga, ingʼolo ni ngundya, na vafundza-magoobeli.
15: UYesu pe adziweene idzo, iivilasaga indegesi guvedze mukopodzi, akuvadagaga vonda avaagudzaga mu lipaala, pamwinga ni senga ni ngʼolo. Iikunamulaga ifitagala fya vafundza-magoobeli, nu kutaagasa amagoobeli gaawo.
16: UYesu akuvalongelaga avaagudzaga ingundya iitigilaga, “Muhedze apa ingundya idzi! Mutane ukuhambusa inyumba ya Daada ukuvedza ligulilo!”
17: Avanyigendwa vaakwe pe vaapuliike idzo, viikwiwukaga uWusimbe uWiimike kye wiitigila, “Uwende wangu ku nyumba yaako, wuhadza wukuungʼoma.”
18: Neke avalongodzi va Vayahudi pe vadziweene dze aalimile uYesu, vamuwuudzage vatigilage, “Uhadza wiihuufya ikimanyilo kiki ukuwoneesa ukutigila uli nu wutawulilwe wa kulima idzo?”
19: UYesu akuvalongelaga iitigilaga, “Mumamule itembeli iyi, uneene ndihadza ndiidzenga mu figono fidatu.”
20: Neke aveene vamuhigage vatigilage, “Itembeli iyi yaadzengiilwe musika gwa myaka makyumi gatayi nu mutanda (46). Uveeve wiidzenga wuli mu figono fidatu?”
21: Neke kangi uYesu asaalongaga ulwa tembeli, aalongaga ulwa muvili gwakwe.
22: Pe aadzulubwike ukuhuma ku wulungu, avanyigendwa vaakwe viikwiwukaga amadzwi ge aalongaga. Viifuuwaga amadzwi agaasimbiilwe mu Wusimbe uWiimike na ge aalongaga uYesu.
23: UYesu pe aali ku Yelusalemu ku kyaka kya Paasaka, avaanu voloofu vamufuuviilwe, pakuva vaalolaga ifimanyilo fye aalimaga.
24: Neke kangi uYesu asavafuuviilwe, pakuva avadzeeliye avaanu vonda.
25: Kangi asaasakaga umuunu ye avedzaga amulongele dze viihoodza avaanu, pakuva adzidzeeliye dzonda idzaali mu numbula dzaawo.
